definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: lowland;—alw. abs. ´[[שׁ]]: c. art., exc. sf. [[שְׁפֵלָתׂה]] Jos 11:16;—lowland:

usually term. techn. of strip W. of Judaean mts. (on exact limits v. GASm:Geogr. 201 ff.; Expos. Dec. 1896, 404 f. Buhl:Geogr. 104 Dr:Hast. DB iii. 892 f.): almost alw. disting. from [[הָהָר]] and [[הַנֶּגֶב]], sts. from [[הָעֲרָבָה]], in De 1:7, Jos 9:1 (R:D), also from [[חוֹף הַיׇּם]], cf. Jos 10:40, Jos 12:8 (both R:D), Ju Jdg 1:9 (perh. R:D, cf. Bu GFM), Jos 15:33 (P), Je 17:26, Je 32:44, Je 33:13, Ob:Ob 19, Zec 7:7, 2Ch 26:10 (disting. from [[הַמִּישׁוֹר]], table-land E. of Jordan); region of sycomores 1Ki 10:27 = 2Ch 1:15, 2Ch 9:27, 1Ch 27:28.
of lowland (near coast.) N. of Carmel Jos 11:2; W. of mts. of Ephr. v:Jos 11:16 (both R:D).
